title: Anthropic Launches New Model That Spots Zero Days, Makes Wall Street Traders Lose Their Minds
full_text: Anthropic Launches New Model That Spots Zero Days, Makes Wall Street Traders Lose Their Minds. Opus 4.6 has arrived.. Anthropic, the makers of the popular and code-competent chatbot Claude, released a new model Thursday called Claude Opus 4.6.
